alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:50PM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Coast Range, Burney Basin and Shasta County Mountains above 2500 feet including portions of Interstate 5. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels lowering to 1500 to 2500 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
